title: ON 9-24-11 YOU CARRIED AN ARTICLE CALLED fATLE Takeoff.I would like to know if you know anything about the Golden Knights  which were also involved in the crash?One was Hollis,one was Leddbetter and one was Mcdonnel.There were about a dozen guys involved.I was in the 82nd airborne jump club and had jumped with several of them and would like to know how they farred.
text: Hello. Here's what we know about that crash, based on news accounts from the time and eyewitness accounts: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8192
